map.address_query_limit_html: You have exceeded the Google API usage limit. Consider upgrading to a Premium Plan.
map.auth_error_html: There was a problem authenticating your Google Maps account. Create and enable the JavaScript API and Geocoding API permissions of your app.

comments.title: Leave a comment
comments.name: Name

comments.success_moderated: Your comment was posted successfully. We will publish it in a little while, as our blog is moderated.
comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

general.note: Add a note to your order

general.no_matches: Sorry, there are no products in this collection

form.name: Name
form.post_success: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

account.title: My Account
account.intro_text: If you used the alternative method of entry, you’re entered for the same chance to win, just without the warm, fuzzy feeling you get from giving back.

activate_account.title: Set your password and you’re good to go!
activate_account.subtext: You’ve confirmed your email address. Now, create a secure password for secure access to your account.

addresses.title: Your Addresses
addresses.delete_confirm: Are you sure you wish to delete this address?

login.title: Sign in to access your Omaze account
login.password_reset_expired: Your password reset link expired. Hit 'forgot password' and let's try this again!

none.start: This is where you’ll see experiences that you entered to win by making a donation.

order.title: Order #: {{ name }}
order.loyalty_bonus_message: {{ quantity }}x bonus applied. Thanks for being Omazing!

recover_password.title: Forgot your password?
recover_password.instruction: Don’t worry, it happens! Just enter your email below and we’ll send you a link to set a new password.
recover_password.subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.
recover_password.failure: Something went wrong, please try again in a few minutes.

recover_account.title: Check your email to reset your password!
recover_account.message_html: We sent an email to {{ email }} with a link to update your password.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.subtext_html: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

register.title: Create Account
register.have_account: Already have an account? Login here.

account_confirmation.title: Check your email to confirm your account
account_confirmation.message_html: We sent an email to {{ email }} to confirm your account and give you access to your donation history.
account_confirmation.rebrand_title: To verify your account, check your email.

onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

issued.title_html: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem_html: Use this code at checkout to redeem your {{ value }} gift card

messages.login_success: Welcome back! It's good to see you again.
messages.password_reset_success: Success! You’ve got a new password.
messages.register_success: Welcome! We’re so glad you’re here.
messages.activate_success: Welcome! We’re so glad you’re here.
messages.ccpa_opt_out_success: Thank you for submitting your opt out, it has been stored. You will be opted out of any future sale of your information. If you have any questions, please reach out to privacy-requests@omaze.com.
messages.ccpa_opt_out_failure: Something went wrong, please try again in a few minutes.

validation_errors.email_invalid: Oops, that doesn't seem to be a valid email format!
validation_errors.email_exists: This email address already has an account! Try logging in.
validation_errors.password_too_short: Password must have at least 5 characters.
validation_errors.account_not_found: We couldn't find an account with that email.

marketing.accept_marketing_checkbox_label: Want extra entries, winner info, impact updates and more? Check the box to sign up for emails! It's not required, you can opt out at any time and we don't sell your info to third parties.

shipping.shipping_copy: This experience comes with the chance to win additional prizes, so if you win one we’ll ship it to you!

opt_in_copy.signup: Get bonus entries, winner info, impact updates and more! You can opt out at any time, and opting in isn’t required to participate with Omaze.
opt_in_copy.checkout: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Use, {% officialRules %}Official Rules{% end officialRules %}, Privacy Policy and Refund Policy. For State Disclosure Information, {% stateDisclosure %}click here{% end stateDisclosure %}.
